title: RSN entitled user
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an RSN Reseller entitlement (example: dm5tv4@gmail.com)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the Top Menu bar is visible
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN RSN Reseller should included in the tab bar

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the RSN Reseller Tab is selected
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the RSN Reseller content should be presented

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the RSN Reseller Tab is selected
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the background image should update

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has access to multiple RSN Resellers
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should be able to toggle between the two RSN tabs without issue

title: RSN non-Entitled
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has no RSN Reseller entitlements (ex. dm5tv@gmail.com)
custom_steps: WHEN the Top Menu bar is visible
custom_expected: THEN no RSN Reseller items should be included

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a menu item’s Qualifying Entitlements is empty
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN menu item should be visible 
Removed the qualifying Entitlements via proxy and validated that the menu item shows, even for a logged out user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a menu item has  Qualifying Entitlements
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN it should only be visible if the user has the matching entitlement

title: Thumbnails
custom_preconds: GIVEN TV RSN page is active

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN thumbnail should be present and make visual sense within it’s context
THEN thumbnail should be present and make visual sense within it’s context
THEN replace all the thumbnails in the carousel with generic white background

title: Hide Spoilers (Proxy required)
custom_preconds: GIVEN an RSN tab is present

title: Hero image does not load (Proxy required)
custom_preconds: GIVEN an RSN tab is present

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN there is no thumbnail for the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN display the autoplay error screen

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN there is no thumbnail for the hero 
AND the user clicks on the hero thumbnail
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they should navigate to the player

title: Hero click behavior-autoplay off
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the RSN tab is present
AND autoplay of hero content is off
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on the hero thumbnail
custom_expected: THEN they should navigate to the player

title: Duration

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN thumbnail content is not LIVE
